attributes.title: Understand your products first before optimizing
attributes.summary: Together with Juliana Jackson we explore why many optimizers aren’t focusing on understanding their products before optimizing for sales & marketing.  And why they should...
attributes.description: Together with Juliana Jackson we explore why many optimizers aren’t focusing on understanding their products before optimizing for sales & marketing. And why they should... Guest: Juliana Jackson URL: https://www.cro.cafe/guest/juliana-jackson
